sentences: Sam Yahel (born 1971) is a jazz pianist and Hammond organist.
In 1990 he moved to New York City and worked with Bill Frisell, Wycliffe Gordon, Ryan Kisor, Maceo Parker, Madeleine Peyroux, and Joshua Redman.
Jazz Side of the Moon (Chesky, 2008) with Ari Hoenig, Mike Moreno, Seamus Blake.
Charles Davis, Plays the Music of Bent Jaeding (Fresh Sound, 2008)
Brad Mehldau, Ma Femme Est Une Actrice (Warner, 2001)
Ben Perowsky, Bop On Pop (JazzKey Music 2003)
Madeleine Peyroux, Half the Perfect World (Rounder, 2006)
